channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Paint, 30th May
item.description:
Paint has appeared on various items around Lynworth Green. There is evidence of paint on various lamp posts, bollards and storm drain covers. Please clean as its very unsightly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Lynworth Place, Whaddon, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin overflowing, 29th May
item.description:
Please could it be emptied.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Pilley Lane, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Caernarvon park flytipping, 29th May
item.description:
There is an abandoned office chair in the children's play area, as well as a huge amount of litter. Please could someone take a look? Thanks!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Caernarvon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: All traffic lights are stuck on red, 29th May

item.title: Pothole just before bus stop outside The Range, 29th May
item.description:
Heading to Cheltenham from the roundabout, with Dunelm, The Range etc on your right. There is a pothole just before the bus stop in the left hand lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: 8 cm deep pothole, only Bertus way near the junction of Griffiths Avenue, 29th May
item.description:
This is a deep pot hole under repeat offender. Perhaps you could service a little bit of a longer stretch

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Libertus Road, Rowanfield, Cheltenham

item.title: Grass cutting, 29th May
item.description:
The grass at the park urgently needs cutting. It’s causing problems as there is nowhere for children to play football etc. It’s not easy to see where dogs have pooed so it’s not getting picked up and then gets stood in. Benhall community picnic is on Sat 3rd June so really needs to be sorted by then please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 20, Bibury Road, Benhall, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Bedford Avenue, Rowanfield, Cheltenham

item.title: Grass verge needs cutting back, 29th May
item.description:

item.title: Overgrown trees, 27th May
item.description:
The trees are overgrown (more than 20 foot+ in height), covered in ivy, appear to be damaged and are leaning over in to the gardens of the houses mentioned above. A major concern is the trees or large branches falling and causing damage to the properties as well as injuries or worse to the occupiers and users of the footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Draycot Road, St Mark's, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
